text: Electro is the name of two fictional Marvel Comics supervillains created by Stan Lee and an enemy of Spider-Man and Daredevil. He is a white supervillain who uses his superpowers, which give him control over electricity, to commit crimes and fight Spider-Man. He is a founding member of the supervillain group, the Sinister Six. The first and most well-known version of the character is Maxwell "Max" Dillon, a lineman for an electric company who turned to a life of crime after being struck by lightning while working on a power line and becoming a living electric capacitor. Since his conception, the character has undergone several design changes, from his original green and yellow costume, to his modern look with blue skin and a bald head. During the time that Max Dillon was dead between 2016 and 2021, a second Electro named Francine Frye was introduced. ==In other media == The character has been adapted to different forms of media, including toys, movies, television series, and video games. Actor Jamie Foxx played Max Dillon / Electro in 2014's The Amazing Spider-Man 2. He returned as Electro in Spider-Man: No Way Home (2021). == References == Category:Characters created by Stan Lee Category:Marvel Comics mutates Category:Marvel Comics supervillains Category:Fictional characters with electric or magnetic abilities Category:Spider-Man
title: Electro (Marvel Comics)
